text.0: first worship those who come at early morning let the twain drink before the giftless niggard.
text.1: the aśvins claim the sacrifice at daybreak the sages yielding the first share extol them.
text.2: worship at dawn and instigate the aśvins nor is the worshipper at eve rejected.
text.3: besides ourselves another craves and worships each first in worship is most highly favoured.
text.4: covered with gold meathtinted dropping fatness your chariot with its freight of food comes hither.
text.5: swift as thought aśvins rapid as the tempest wherewith ye travel over all obstructions.
text.6: he who hath served most often the nāsatyas and gives the sweetest food at distribution.
text.7: furthers with his own holy works his offspring and ever passes those whose flames ascend not.
text.8: may we obtain the aśvins newest favour and gain their healthbestowing happy guidance.
text.9: bring riches hither unto us and heroes and all felicity and joy immortals.
